text: Arlene McQuade (May 29, 1936 - April 21, 2014) was an American actress. She started acting in 1950. She was best known for playing Rosalie in The Goldbergs. She was born in New York City, New York. McQuade died from Parkinson's disease on April 21, 2014 in Santa Fe, New Mexico. He was 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in New Mexico
title: Arlene McQuade
